column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Zoe - Thanks for your review. Our "Irrashai" greeting can be a little overwhelming
column2: but it's an integral part of our corporate culture here at JINYA. As a Japanese company that came to the U.S. several years ago
column3: JINYA added several service customs that you will find in Japan today
column6: staff are trained to yell the "Irrashai" greetings to show their enthusiasm and genki spirit. Genki (元気) is a common Japanese word that means "energetic
column7: lively and healthy." Thanks again for your business
column8: and we look forward to serving you again soon.
